name: Algora
title: algora.io
shortDescription: Algora is an innovative tech recruiting platform that leverages GitHub's OSS contribution data to streamline the hiring process of engineers. It's designed for companies looking to hire skilled developers quickly and cost-effectively. Users can assess candidates through paid trials and manage global payments efficiently. An example use case is a tech startup using Algora to find and hire a developer who has proven their skills through open source contributions.
pros: Efficient screening and ranking of applicants
Access to a large pool of top developers
cons: Dependent on GitHub contributions, which may not reflect all skills
Limited to developers familiar with open source
